info.title: BookBug API
info.description: API for BookBug - A book review and discussion platform

get.description: Returns 200 OK if the server is running

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns a JWT token
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

get.description: Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes the account of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new book entry in the system

400.description: Book with this ISBN already exists

get.description: Returns a book by its ID including reviews and ratings

delete.description: Deletes a book from the system

get.description: Returns a book by its ISBN including reviews and ratings
Returns all categories with their book counts
Returns a specific category by its ID including books and their reviews

delete.description: Deletes an existing category if it has no books

post.description: Creates a new review for a book

400.description: Invalid rating value or book/user not found

post.description: Creates a new reply to a review

get.description: Returns all replies for a specific review
Returns a specific reply by its ID

403.description: Not authorized to update this reply
Not authorized to delete this reply

post.description: Creates a new comment on a reply

get.description: Returns all comments for a specific reply
Returns a specific comment by its ID

403.description: Not authorized to update this comment
Not authorized to delete this comment
